omni - omnipotent tool (v0.0.26-43-g4bdc6a1-dirty)

Show help for omni commands

If no command is given, show a list of all available commands.

Usage: omni help [OPTIONS] [command]

Arguments:
  [command]      The command to get help for

Options:
  --unfold <UNFOLD>  Show all subcommands

Source: builtin
